metrics module¶

class metrics.EvasionMetrics(clf: learners.learner.RobustLearner, pre: typing.List[data_reader.input.Instance], post: typing.List[data_reader.input.Instance])[source]¶

Bases: object

Metrics class for classifier performance evaluation Current supported metrics:

precision, recall, accuracy, ROC, area under ROC curve
